text: Events from the year 1695 in China. == Incumbents == * Kangxi Emperor (34rd year) == Events == * A moonloft on the Huaisheng Mosque in Guangzhou was built * 2nd Month: the reconstruction of the Hall of Supreme Harmony begins * 5th Month: further tours are made in the outskirts of the capital. New dams and inlets at seaports are inspected. The Temple of the Sea God (Haishen miao) is constructed. * 6th Month: Lady Si is named the consort of Heir Apparent Yunreng. * 11th Month: the emperor conducts a grand military inspection at the South Gardens (Nan yuan). Orders are issued for codifying the use of horns and drums in military inspections. ==Births== ==Deaths== ==References== * * . China
title: 1695 in China
